name: Purchase Receipt Details
query:
SELECT
    pr.title AS shipment_name,
    pri.item_code,
    pri.item_name,
    pri.brand,
    SUM(pri.qty) AS qty
FROM
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pri
INNER JOIN
    `tabPurchase Receipt` pr
ON
    pri.parent = pr.name
INNER JOIN
    `tabItem` i
ON
    pri.item_code = i.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabTire Size` ts
ON
    i.tire_size = ts.name
WHERE
    pri.docstatus != 2
    AND pr.docstatus != 2
    AND pri.qty > 0
    AND is_return = 0
    AND pri.parent = %(purchase_receipt)s
    AND pr.name = %(purchase_receipt)s
GROUP BY
    pr.title,
    pri.item_code,
    pri.item_name,
    pri.brand
ORDER BY
    pri.brand,
    ts.sorting_code,
    pri.item_code
